snippet: Rescue workers continued to recover bodies from the wreckage of the airliner that crashed into a crowded, working-class neighborhood in Lagos on Sunday.
abstract: Rescue workers continue to recover bodies from the wreckage of a crashed airliner in Lagos, Nigera, as residents grapple with the deaths of all 153 passengers.
lead_paragraph: Rescue workers continued to recover bodies from the wreckage of the airliner that crashed into a crowded, working-class neighborhood in Lagos on Sunday.

headline.seo: In Nigeria, Stunned Residents Recount Plane Crash
headline.main: In Nigeria, Stunned Residents Recount Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: In Nigeria, Stunned Residents Recount Plane Crash
